body_text: We currently have multiple sources of info for how users interact with the Heartbeat prompt, including Input, Telemetry, and GA. We plan to depend primarily on Telemetry in the future, and we'd like to run a test to ensure that Telemetry data about Heartbeat interactions is being sent correctly.

title: Verify telemetry numbers for heartbeat
body: We currently have multiple sources of info for how users interact with the Heartbeat prompt, including Input, Telemetry, and GA. We plan to depend primarily on Telemetry in the future, and we'd like to run a test to ensure that Telemetry data about Heartbeat interactions is being sent correctly.
